ygData.subject: Re: Staff Segments - E. Karanas and Hpk
ygData.msgSnippet: Crystal Jeffreys-O Lyne wrote: From: Crystal Jeffreys-O Lyne
ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
Crystal Jeffreys-O'Lyne wrote:
<blockquote TYPE=CITE>From: Crystal Jeffreys-O'Lyne <cobaltwolf@...>
<p>In E. Karanas there is a named bandit that you can kill, he drops a
<br>staff segment and a hpk bank key.  Upon turning in the key you
recieve
<br>another staff segment.  Does anyone know what you do with these
items.
<p>Thanks</blockquote>
There for a Battle staff quest in HHk .. but nobody know where to combine
the Staff ( The key you turns in to the lady in HHk bank to get other staff
Segment )
<br> 
<br> 
<br> 
<p>--
<p>Jamie Macdonald
<p>A.K.A
<br>Magis DarkStone
<br>Mercenary Mage
<br>Erollisi Marr
<p>-----------------------------------------------------------
<p>"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."
<p>"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
<p>"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
<br>-----------------------------------------------------------
<br> </html>
